name: desk-ui
description: HTML front-end for visualization (3D objects and medical images)
author: Sebastien Valette <sebastien.valette@creatis.insa-lyon.fr> (http://www.creatis.insa-lyon.fr/~valette)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run qooxdoo && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: node source/build-worker.js && webpack && npm run terser
scripts.compile: qx compile --target source && qx compile --target build
scripts.qooxdoo: qx pkg update && qx pkg install && npm run compile
scripts.updateAll: npm run updateQooxdoo && rm -rf node_modules && git pull && npm install && npm run build
